page.title: 11BURGHFIELD COMMON-SERVICES
page.content: There are many shops and services in Burghfield Common,making it an impor- tant rural settlement.The majority of these services are located on either Reading Road or Clayhill Road.The village's shopping facilities include three food 'mini-markets',two news- agents,a pet-food store,and a bakery. On Reading Road,the post office has a wool shop,and the village bank is nearby.On Clayhill Road,ther is a hairdresser's and a Fish'n'Chip take- away shop. The village has two public houses- "The Rising Sun" and "The Bantam"- and there are two filling stations,one of which was modernised by ESSO in 1985.The village also boasts an auto- matic telephone exchange,and the three schools cater for all ages of children .There is also a Car Sales service and a garden centre located nearby.
